science.concept_principal: Cuisson Basse Température et Dénaturation Contrôlée des Protéines
science.mecanisme: Dénaturation progressive myosine (40-60°C) et actine (66-80°C) sans contraction brutale, préservant jutosité maximale

hero.description: Poulet entier rôti doré, peau croustillante dorée, servi sur plat blanc avec herbes fraîches
hero.prompt: Professional food photography of a golden roasted whole chicken with crispy skin, placed on a white serving platter, garnished with fresh thyme sprigs and lemon wedges, natural lighting from the side, minimalist scientific aesthetic, top-down 45-degree angle, shallow depth of field

process.description: Poulet entier cru badigeonné d'huile et herbes, prêt à enfourner
process.prompt: Raw whole chicken being brushed with olive oil and herbs, top-down view, ingredients visible around (thyme, garlic, lemon), clean kitchen counter, natural daylight, minimalist composition

process.description: Thermomètre à sonde inséré dans le blanc du poulet montrant 72°C
process.prompt: Close-up of a digital meat thermometer probe inserted into chicken breast showing 72°C on display, roasted chicken in background slightly blurred, scientific precision focus, natural lighting

final.description: Poulet rôti tranché révélant chair rosée et juteuse avec jus de cuisson
final.prompt: Sliced roasted chicken breast and thigh on a white plate, revealing pink juicy meat with cooking juices, garnished with fresh herbs, side view 45-degree angle, natural lighting, food photography style, appetizing presentation
